text: la taquluu -ayha almwmnwn- eind ndaykm rasul allh: ya mhmd, wala ya muhamad bin eabd allh, kama yaqul dhlk baedukum lbed, wlkn shrrifwh, wqwlu: ya nabiin allh, ya rasul allh. qad yaelam allah almunafiqin aladhin yakhrujun min majlis alnabiu salaa allah ealayh wasalam khafiat bighayr 'idhnh, ylwdh bedhm bbed, flyahdhar aladhin yukhalifun 'amr rasul allah 'an tunazal bihim mihnat wshr, 'aw yusibahum eadhab mulim mwje fi alakhrt
